cPostModuleAddNotification Class Reference

#include <cmodelchange.h>

Inheritance diagram for cPostModuleAddNotification:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Fired at the end of cModuleType::create(); at that stage the module is already created, its gates and parameters are added and it is inserted into the model, but it is not yet initialized nor its submodules are created yet.

Public Attributes

cModule * module

Member Data Documentation

cModule* cPostModuleAddNotification::module

The new module.
